verses.roman:
ei karma kare kāhāṅ vidagdha-śiromaṇi?
lakṣmīra agrete nija prabhure deha' āni' "

synonyms: ei—this; karma—work; kare—does; kāhāṅ—where; vidagdha-śiromaṇi—the chief of all experts; lakṣmīra—of the goddess of fortune; agrete—in front; nija—your own; prabhure—master; deha'-present; āni'-bringing.
translation: " 'Your master is so expert at everything, but why does He do such things? Please bring your master before the goddess of fortune.'
